alttitle Direct Mail Module This module sends newsletters to lists of targeted recipients. Each Direct Mail folder is a specifically configured work area for this module. Select the folder you wish to work with. The Direct Mail process let you create newsletter pages which can then be emailed to people on a recipient list. The following are the main steps of the Direct mail process:
1. Creating a newsletter: a newsletter is basically a regular Typo3 page which resides in the Direct Mail folder.
2. Categorizing the content elements: you may assign categories to the content elements of the newsletter; the newsletter emailed to each subscriber will be tailored to the categories the subscriber has subscribed to.
3. Creating a Direct Mail: a Direct Mail is a record that contains a compiled version of the newsletter page and all the information required for the mailing.
4. Building recipient lists: there is a number of ways by which recipient lists may be built.
5. Sending a test: it is good practice to send a test mail to make sure that the newsletter that will be send to the recipient list looks as expected when received in a client email application.
6. Invoking the mailer engine: schedule the actual sending of the newsletter to a specific recipient list.
7. Viewing the status of mass mailings: monitor the sending of the newsletters, view response statistics, and take action on returned mails.
Other available functions are: 8. Importing a csv list of email addresses; 9. Sending a quick mail. sys_dmail, sys_dmail_group, sys_dmail_category Select one of these already created newsletter.

languageKey.label: Module d'Envoi ciblé

Ce module envoi des bulletins de nouvelles à des listes de destinataires ciblés. Chaque dossier d'Envoi ciblé constitue une aire de travail spécifiquement configurée pour ce module. Sélectionnez le dossier sur lequel vous désirez travailler.
